about.summary: An extensible framework for automatically placing direct labels onto multicolor 'lattice' or 'ggplot2' plots. Label positions are described using Positioning Methods which can be re-used across several different plots. There are heuristics for examining "trellis" and "ggplot" objects and inferring an appropriate Positioning Method.

name: r-directlabels
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2020.1.31' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-directlabels
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/directlabels_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/directlabels/directlabels_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cce858bfb70cd9effbf903c3bffc6e0272f87170002bc9a1eac82e72b97d4123

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-quadprog
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-quadprog

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('directlabels')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('directlabels')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/tdhock/directlabels
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: An extensible framework for automatically placing direct labels onto multicolor 'lattice'
    or 'ggplot2' plots. Label positions are described using Positioning Methods which
    can be re-used across several different plots. There are heuristics for examining
    "trellis" and "ggplot" objects and inferring an appropriate Positioning Method.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - nsoranzo

# Package: directlabels
# Maintainer: Toby Dylan Hocking <toby.hocking@r-project.org>
# Author: Toby Dylan Hocking
# Version: 2020.1.31
# BugReports: https://github.com/tdhock/directlabels/issues
# License: GPL-3
# Title: Direct Labels for Multicolor Plots
# Description: An extensible framework for automatically placing direct labels onto multicolor 'lattice' or 'ggplot2' plots. Label positions are described using Positioning Methods which can be re-used across several different plots. There are heuristics for examining "trellis" and "ggplot" objects and inferring an appropriate Positioning Method.
# URL: https://github.com/tdhock/directlabels
# LazyData: true
# Suggests: MASS, inlinedocs, ggplot2 (>= 2.0), rlang, lattice, alphahull, nlme, lars, latticeExtra, testthat
# Imports: grid, quadprog
# Collate: utility.function.R compare.R dotplot.R lineplot.R densityplot.R ggplot2.R positioning.functions.R doc.R lattice.R scatterplot.R contourplot.R
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-01-31 16:59:38 UTC; th798
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-02-01 09:10:02 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
